title: SVNIT Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 02 Junior Research Fellow, Project Associate Posts
description: The Saradar Vallabhbhai Institute of Technology (SVNIT) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02 Junior Research Fellow, Project Assistant Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech and M.Sc. can apply for the SVNIT Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the educ...
